boardgame.name: Inca Empire
boardgame.description: In Inca Empire, each player is an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Apu,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; or leader of one of the four regions (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;suyus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;). Your job as an Apu is to increase your status in the eyes of the divine emperor (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Sapa Inca_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) by doing the best job of expanding and improving the empire. Each Apu begins with the manpower of their region. They build roads and conquer neighboring regions, increasing the manpower and resources available to them. Apus are rewarded for each new region they add to the empire and for improvements such as terraces, garrisons, cities, and temples._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player who has the most victory points (VP) at the moment Pizarro arrives at the Inca capital of Cuzco wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Note: Due to the highly interactive nature of the Sun card placement, Inca Empire cannot be played with only two players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Inca Empire is a reimplementation of Tahuantinsuyu._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2011 International Gamers Award - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Inca Empire: Bonus Sun Event Cards
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Podcast #030 - Monográfico: Ya ha llegado Essen 2010
The Game Pit: Episode 58 - Nations and More....

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Multilingual edition White Goblin Games

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7058) In INCA EMPIRE the players are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Apus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (leader of one of the four regions/suyus). Your job as an Apu is to increase your status in the eyes of the divine emperor (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Sapa Inca_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) by doing the best job of expanding and improving the empire. Each Apu begins with the manpower of their region of the original empire. They build roads and conquer neighboring regions, increasing the manpower and resources available to them. Apus are awarded for each new region they add to the empire and for improvements such as terraces, garrisons, cities and temples. The player who has the most victory points (VP) at the moment Pizarro arrives in the Inca capital at Cuzco wins the game. A reinvisioning of the game, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Tahuantinsuyu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7058) In INCA EMPIRE the players are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Apus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (leader of one of the four regions/suyus). Your job as an Apu is to increase your status in the eyes of the divine emperor (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Sapa Inca_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) by doing the best job of expanding and improving the empire. Each Apu begins with the manpower of their region of the original empire. They build roads and conquer neighboring regions, increasing the manpower and resources available to them. Apus are awarded for each new region they add to the empire and for improvements such as terraces, garrisons, cities and temples. The player who has the most victory points (VP) at the moment Pizarro arrives in the Inca capital at Cuzco wins the game. A reinvisioning of the game, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Tahuantinsuyu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.
